name: NEW SEXY Notion.so DARK THEME
description:
this is my first dark theme or any theme for any website ever. the css is a little messy but it works.
notion doesnt really have a dark thme aside from one that doesnt work anymore. so i made one myself.
additional_info:
-for latest notion version
-only effects notion app itself not homepages
- all notion links are now the same color as text and no longer dark for visibility
-bug fixes
